svg.text: From Theory to Empirical Proof: The Engineering Way

g.text: • Know exactly what to optimize next
This is how you become undeniable:
"My CPU transformer beats A100 on edge"
YOUR MEASUREMENT ARSENAL: TOOLS FOR EVERY LAYER
Example Integration: "My transformer uses 2.3W at 100 tokens/sec (oscilloscope),
achieving 89% FMA utilization (VTune), with 0.3% cache miss rate (perf counters)"
This is irrefutable evidence of optimization!
Every optimization becomes a controlled experiment
This is how you build unshakeable knowledge!
Threads writing to same cache line!
PMU: L2 prefetch hit rate varies wildly
Stride detector triggers on specific sizes
The Pattern: Every Performance Mystery Has Measurable Evidence
This process has found EVERY major optimization in your code!
The Powerful Combination: AI Helps Interpret Your Measurements
You: "Here's my perf data showing 40% stalls"
Check load-to-use latency in your code."
AI: "Those are load ports. Your code is
Your YouTube videos will be different:
"Here's my transformer running at 474 GFLOPS on CPU"
"Let me show you the VTune trace proving why it's fast"
"Here's the exact cache miss rate at each layer"
This is how you become the go-to expert for efficient AI

svg.text: Remember: "In God we trust. All others must bring data." - W. Edwards Deming
